value.title: Recognize entities in text with the text analytics API
value.excerpt: Identify and categorize entities in your text as people, places, organizations, date/time, quantities, percentages, currencies, and more.

value.title: Identify governing practices for responsible AI
value.excerpt: Learn guiding principles for organizations, and how to choose and operationalize a governance system to responsibly and successfully use AI in the enterprise.

value.title: SAP HANA on Azure Compute, Network, and Storage
value.excerpt: AP HANA on Azure (Large Instances) provides virtual machines for deploying and running SAP HANA. This module explores the SAP HANA on Azure (Large Instances) solution that builds on assigned, non -shared host/server bare -metal hardware.

value.title: Introduction to threat modeling
value.excerpt: Explore the four high-level steps of threat modeling.

value.title: Develop IoT solutions with Azure IoT Central
value.excerpt: Follow this learning path for a broad and compelling introduction to the fundamentals of building IoT solutions with Azure IoT.

topItems.title: Create your first Azure IoT Central app
topItems.excerpt: This module builds an IoT Central app to monitor and command a refrigerated truck. The first unit creates the app, the second unit defines a device template for a refrigerated truck. Then, create a programming project, add code to simulate a truck, and communicate with your IoT Central app. The truck is monitored through a custom dashboard.

topItems.title: Set up rules and take action on telemetry data in Azure IoT Central
topItems.excerpt: This module builds an IoT Central app to monitor and command a refrigerated truck. We build the IoT Central app from a downloaded JSON file, defining all the device capabilities. Source code is also downloaded for the device app. The focus of this module is on creating rules and actions, to respond to certain telemetry input. Rules and actions enable greater automation of an IoT Central system.

topItems.title: Manage IoT Central applications with the REST API
topItems.excerpt: In this module, you'll learn how to manage an IoT Central application programmatically using the REST API

topItems.title: Set up continuous data export from Azure IoT Central to a Power BI app
topItems.excerpt: This module covers continuous data export from IoT Central. You use the scenario from your previously completed "Create your first Azure IoT Central app" Learn module, where you controlled a refrigerated truck. Here, in this module, you add continuous data export to both Azure Blob storage and an event hub. You then build a Power BI app to read and display the telemetry data on a mobile phone.

value.title: Improve your reliability with modern operations practices
value.excerpt: The reliability of your systems, services and products has a direct impact on your success. Learn the modern operations principles and practices (and the Azure features that support them) that will help you achieve the level of reliability you need.

topItems.title: Improve your reliability with modern operations practices: An introduction
topItems.excerpt: Discover a map for navigating reliability challenges and sustainably achieving the appropriate level of reliability in your systems, services, and products.

topItems.title: Improve your reliability with modern operations practices: Monitoring
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use monitoring to help you sustainably achieve the appropriate level of reliability in your systems, services, and products.

topItems.title: Improve your reliability with modern operations practices: Incident response
topItems.excerpt: Learn the incident response fundamentals necessary to help you sustainably achieve the appropriate level of reliability in your systems, services, and products.

topItems.title: Improve your reliability with modern operations practices: Learning from failure
topItems.excerpt: Learn about post-incident reviews, a practice necessary to help you sustainably achieve the appropriate level of reliability in your systems, services, and products.

value.excerpt: Plan and implement an identity governance strategy

topItems.excerpt: Plan and implement entitlement management

value.excerpt: SC-300 part 4: Plan and implement an identity governance strategy

topItems.title: Plan and implement entitlement management

topItems.title: Plan, implement, and manage access review

topItems.title: Monitor and maintain Azure Active Directory
topItems.excerpt: Monitor and maintain Azure Active Directory

value.title: Deploy a containerized application on Azure Kubernetes Service
value.excerpt: Explore how to create and deploy a containerized application by using Azure Kubernetes Service declarative manifest files.

value.title: Applications and infrastructure migration and modernization
value.excerpt: Every modern business is powered by applications, such as internal procurement applications, Customer Relationship Management (CRM) systems, retail websites, and third-party products. As your business prepares for digital transformation, it’s important to begin modernizing and migrating your applications and infrastructure to the cloud. Azure is a key component of that process. You can choose to migrate, modernize, or build cloud native solutions depending on your business goals and how you assess your application portfolio. This is a strategic decision. You’ll be able to choose the path that’s right for your organization.

value.title: Monitor cloud resources
value.excerpt: Cloud Admin course from Dr. Majd Sakr at Carnegie Mellon University. Monitoring how your cloud resources are performing is crucial to building reliable cloud applications. This module covers what monitoring is, why you need to do it, and how you can about monitoring your resources.

value.title: Create a new Node.js project and work with dependencies
value.excerpt: Create a Node.js project and learn to add packages and manage package dependencies in your project. Use the NPM CLI and registry to add libraries and tools to your JavaScript/TypeScript applications using Visual Studio Code.

value.title: Get started with Go
value.excerpt: Take your first steps with Go.

value.title: Centralize your core services by using hub and spoke Azure virtual network architecture
value.excerpt: Design a network architecture in Azure that allows for growth and flexibility, secure isolation of critical resources, low administrative overhead, and communication with on-premises network resources.

value.title: Orchestrate data movement and transformation in Azure Data Factory or Azure Synapse Pipeline
value.excerpt: Orchestrate data movement and transformation in Azure Data Factory or Azure Synapse Pipeline

value.title: Cloud computing basics for developers
value.excerpt: The first learning path in a course on cloud computing for developers from Carnegie Mellon University. Learn about the basics of the cloud, including the history, building blocks, and types. This learning path prepares developers for real-world cloud practice on Azure.

topItems.title: Foundations of cloud computing for developers
topItems.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Discover what the cloud is, the history of cloud computing, what types of clouds are available, and how you might use the cloud.

topItems.title: Economics of cloud computing
topItems.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Learn how developers pay to use the cloud and how cloud providers are able to charge for their services. Get an overview of how the cloud is kept secure.

topItems.title: Datacenter trends in cloud computing
topItems.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Datacenters are what power the cloud. Learn what they are, how they work, and challenges in managing them.

topItems.title: Datacenter components
topItems.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Take a deep dive into datacenters to discover how they are laid out and how computing resources are provisioned and metered.

value.title: Discover ways to foster an AI-ready culture in your business
value.excerpt: Learn AI solutions to implement based upon organization maturity and a framework to drive the key changes that are necessary to become an AI-ready organization.

topItems.title: Understand the importance of building an AI-ready culture
topItems.excerpt: Understand the key elements that make a culture AI-ready and a framework to drive the change needed in your organization for a successful AI strategy.

topItems.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in finance
topItems.excerpt: Learn the necessary cultural changes for enterprise finance organizations to make AI transformation successful, and how they fit into a holistic AI strategy.

topItems.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in marketing
topItems.excerpt: Learn the necessary cultural changes for enterprise marketing organizations to make AI transformation successful, and how they fit into a holistic AI strategy.

topItems.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in sales
topItems.excerpt: Learn the necessary cultural changes for enterprise sales organizations to make AI transformation successful, and how they fit into a holistic AI strategy.

value.title: Get Started Querying with Transact-SQL
value.excerpt: Get Started Querying with Transact-SQL

topItems.title: Introduction to Transact-SQL
topItems.excerpt: Introduction to Transact-SQL

topItems.title: Combine multiple tables with JOINs in T-SQL
topItems.excerpt: Combine multiple tables with JOINs in T-SQL

topItems.title: Write Subqueries in T-SQL
topItems.excerpt: Write Subqueries in T-SQL

topItems.title: Use built-in functions and GROUP BY in Transact-SQL
topItems.excerpt: Use built-in functions and GROUP BY in Transact-SQL

value.title: Large-Scale Data Processing with Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2
value.excerpt: With this learning path, you'll use Azure Data Lake Storage to process your Big Data efficiently and easily while also being protected by Azure’s host of security features.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage
topItems.excerpt: Discover how Data Lake Storage provides a repository where you can upload and store unstructured data bringing new efficiencies to processing big data analytics.

topItems.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage
topItems.excerpt: Learn about creating an Azure Data Lake Storage account and uploading data to Data Lake Storage Gen 2 through the Azure Storage Explorer.

topItems.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data with access keys, secure networks, and Advanced Threat Protection monitoring.

value.title: Migrate virtual machines and apps using Azure Migrate
value.excerpt: The Virtual machine and app migration using Azure Migrate learning path gives you a step-by-step process to help you understand, set up, assess, and migrate virtual and physical servers, databases, applications, and virtual desktops from on-premises to the Azure infrastructure. Azure Migrate now includes fully integrated and optimized migration-specific tools previously available only in Azure Site Recovery.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Migrate for server migration
topItems.excerpt: Discover how Azure Migrate helps you realize the benefits of moving your on-premises VMware or Hyper-V server workloads to Azure infrastructure as a service (IaaS). Learn the process for migrating your workload agent-less, all within the hub.

topItems.title: Set up Azure Migrate for server migration
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to check your prerequisite configurations in Azure and in your VMware vSphere environment and then perform the initial steps in Azure Migrate to choose your assessment and migration tools.

topItems.title: Discover and Assess your on-premises servers with Azure Migrate
topItems.excerpt: Explore the Azure Migrate tools for discovering and assessing your virtual machine servers. Learn how to install and configure a virtual machine appliance in your virtualization host infrastructure.

topItems.title: Replicate and migrate virtual machine servers with Azure Migrate
topItems.excerpt: Learn the process for replicating, testing, and finally migrating your virtual machines into production.

value.title: Perform data engineering with Azure Synapse Apache Spark Pools
value.excerpt: Perform data engineering with Azure Synapse Apache Spark Pools

topItems.title: Understand big data engineering with Apache Spark in Azure Synapse Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Understand big data engineering with Apache Spark in Azure Synapse Analytics

topItems.title: Ingest data with Apache Spark notebooks in Azure Synapse Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Ingest data with Apache Spark notebooks in Azure Synapse Analytics

topItems.title: Transform data with DataFrames in Apache Spark Pools in Azure Synapse Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Transform data with DataFrames in Apache Spark Pools in Azure Synapse Analytics

topItems.title: Integrate SQL and Apache Spark pools in Azure Synapse Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Integrate SQL and Apache Spark pools in Azure Synapse Analytics

value.title: Quantum computing foundations
value.excerpt: Intrigued by quantum computing but don't know where to start? This learning path helps prepare you for this exciting next generation of computing.

topItems.title: Get started with Azure Quantum
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to get started with Azure Quantum and create an Azure Quantum workspace.

topItems.title: Create your first Q# program by using the Quantum Development Kit
topItems.excerpt: Get started with Q# programming by building a quantum random number generator.

topItems.title: Explore the key concepts of quantum computing by using Q#
topItems.excerpt: Learn the fundamental concepts of quantum computing by using tools in Q# and the Quantum Development Kit.

topItems.title: Solve graph coloring problems by using Grover's search
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Grover's algorithm can help you solve search problems such as graph coloring problems.

value.title: Characterize DevOps Continuous Collaboration and Continuous Improvement
value.excerpt: Explore two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Collaboration and Continuous Improvement.

value.title: Classify images with the Microsoft Custom Vision Service
value.excerpt: In this learning path, find out how Cognitive Vision Services detects faces, tags and classifies images, and identifies objects.

value.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service
value.excerpt: Use the Computer Vision API to analyze images for insights, extract text from images, and generate high-quality thumbnails.

value.title: Design a geographically distributed application
value.excerpt: Build an application that spans multiple geographic locations for high availability and resiliency.

value.title: Design a Modern Data Warehouse using Azure Synapse Analytics
value.excerpt: Learn how Azure Synapse Analytics enables you to build Data Warehouses using modern architecture patterns.

value.title: Develop and configure an ASP.NET application that queries an Azure SQL database
value.excerpt: Create an Azure SQL database to store data for an application, and create an ASP.NET application to query data from the database.

value.title: Distribute your data globally with Azure Cosmos DB
value.excerpt: Discover the benefits of writing and replicating customized data to regions around the world with Azure Cosmos DB global distribution.

value.title: Implement a code workflow in your build pipeline by using Git and GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn along with the Space Game web team the benefits of collaboration through Visual Studio Code and GitHub.
